items.content_html: Magnet CLI is a lightweight Node.js command-line tool that lets you search, fetch, and stream torrent videos directly using magnet links – all from your terminal. No need for external torrent clients or downloading large files manually. Just search, select, and play!

No need for external torrent clients or downloading large files manually. Just search, select, and play!
